CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( RecordTypeId = "012b0000000g3vn", Blue_vouchers_received__c = FALSE, Blue_Voucher_Booking__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Status_of_the_booking__c,"Created")), TEXT(Number_of_Vouchers__c)+ " " + "Vouchers Outstanding",
IF( AND( RecordTypeId = "012b0000000g3vn", Blue_vouchers_received__c = TRUE, Blue_Voucher_Booking__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Status_of_the_booking__c,"Created")), "Vouchers Received",
IF( AND( RecordTypeId = "012b0000000g3vn",ISPICKVAL(Status_of_the_booking__c,"Cancelled")), "Booking Cancelled", NULL ) ) )
CustomField.label: Blue Voucher Status
